item.title: add newreleases.io
item.description: https://newreleases.io/ - Receive notifications on email, Slack, Telegram, Discord and custom webhooks for new releases from GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Python PyPI, Java Maven, Node.js NPM, Node.js Yarn, Ruby Gems, PHP Packagist, .NET NuGet, Rust Cargo and Docker Hub.

item.title: Add localhost.run
item.description: https://localhost.run/ - Instantly share your localhost environment! No download required. Run your app on port 8080 and then run this command and share the URL.

item.title: Add free eSignature provider
item.description:
#esignature -
https://waiverstevie.com - Request electronic signatures via REST API. Receive notifications with webhooks. Free plan watermarks signed documents.

item.title: Remove non-free and self hosted services from commenting platforms
add commenting platforms
item.description:
#commenting-platforms -
https://getreplybox.com - ReplyBox, a simple, honest comment system. No ads, no dodgy affiliate links, no fluff.
https://staticman.net/ - Staticman is a Node.js application that receives user-generated content and uploads it as data files to a GitHub and/or GitLab repository, using Pull Requests.
https://graphcomment.com/ - GraphComment is a comments platform that helps you build an active community from website’s audience.
https://utteranc.es/ - A lightweight comments widget built on GitHub issues. Use GitHub issues for blog comments, wiki pages and more!
https://www.talkyard.io/blog-comments - Talkyard is a commenting system for your website. Open source, install for free
https://posativ.org/isso - A lightweight commenting server written in Python and JavaScript. It aims to be a drop-in replacement for Disqus.
https://commento.io/ - A fast, privacy-focused commenting platform
https://remark42.com/) - A self-hosted, lightweight, and simple (yet functional - A self-hosted, lightweight, and simple (yet functional) commenting system, which doesn't spy on users.
https://schnack.cool/ - An easy to use, self-hosted and open source commenting system
https://disqus.com/ - Disqus is a networked community platform used by hundreds of thousands of sites all over the web.

item.title: Include Jumpcloud (Azure AD replacement)
item.description: https://jumpcloud.com/ - Provides directory as a service similar to Azure AD, user management, single sign-on, and RADIUS authentication. Free for up to 10 users.
